metadata.title: FitWorld Gym Salonta - Fitness Center
metadata.description: At FitWorld Gym Salonta, we are committed to providing you with a complete fitness experience in a friendly and motivating environment.

hero.subtitle: At FitWorld Gym Salonta, we help you achieve your fitness goals in a friendly and motivating environment.

sections.whatWeOfferText: At FitWorld Gym Salonta, we are committed to providing you with a complete fitness experience in a friendly and motivating environment. Whether you are just starting out or an experienced athlete, we have everything you need to achieve your health and performance goals. This is how FitWorld Gym came to be. With the desire to attract as many followers to the HEALTHY AND BEAUTIFUL LIFESTYLE movement. We welcome you in Salonta!
sections.pricingSubtitle: Here you can find FitWorld Gym subscriptions, perfect for anyone and any lifestyle.
sections.appDescription: Use the GMA app for quick check-in, subscription status, and class booking.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Please leave us a message. We will contact you as soon as possible.
